value.message: Variable name 'o' in `${o}peration` is an arbitrary single-character abbreviation outside of a loop context.
value.suggestion: Rename 'o' to a more descriptive variable name such as 'operationType'.

value.message: Variable name 'g' in `${g}enerateNanoId(12)` is an arbitrary single-character abbreviation outside of a loop context.
value.suggestion: Rename 'g' to a more descriptive variable name such as 'generator'.

value.message: Access control error does not securely fail; missing config falls through to code execution before throwing error.
value.suggestion: Ensure access is denied immediately if config is missing, and avoid executing further logic before throwing error.

value.message: Access control error does not securely fail; missing runway component falls through to code execution before throwing error.
value.suggestion: Deny access and halt execution immediately if runway component is missing.
